title: raadE shyAmaLanEy
sahitya: rAdhE shyAmaLanE! yAdhava kulamAmaNiyE!mAtA yasOdhA magizh mAyavan nIyE!  anupallavi  sAdhu jana pari pAlan nIyE!Odum maRaigaLin uNmaipporuL nIyE!  caraNam  mAtavam seydaRiyEn mAdhavanE! kaDumsodanaiyilum undan kazhal maRandilEnEstOttiram seydunnaip pADi magizhndEnEpArththanukkaruL seyda pAvananE!
